name: Anne-Marie Kermarrec
content: Anne-Marie Kermarrec — People - EPFL Anne-Marie Kermarrec Editer le profil anne-marie.kermarrec@epfl.ch +41 21 693 12 97 Date de naissance:  02.10.1970 https://orcid.org/0000-0001-8187-724X Professeure ordinaire, Systèmes distribués large échelle EPFL IC IINFCOM SACS BC 162 (Bâtiment BC) Station 14 1015 Lausanne +41 21 693 12 97 +41 21 693 75 21 Local: BC 162 EPFL > IC > IINFCOM > SACS Web site: Site web: https://www.epfl.ch/labs/sacs/ Professeure ordinaire, EDIC - Enseignement EPFL > VPA-AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE-EDOC > EDIC-ENS Professeure ordinaire, SIN - Enseignement EPFL > IC > IC-SIN > SIN-ENS Web site: Site web: https://sin.epfl.ch Professeure ordinaire, SSC - Enseignement EPFL > IC > IC-SSC > SSC-ENS Web site: Site web: https://ssc.epfl.ch Vice-présidente associée pour l’éducation doctorale et la formation continue, AVP Education doctorale et formation continue - Gestion EPFL > VPA-AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE-GE Présidente de la CDOCT, Commission doctorale EPFL > VPA-AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE-EDOC > CDOCT Membre, Global Ethics and Partnerships Committee EPFL > VPA > VPA-FAC > GEP Web site: Site web: https://go.epfl.ch/gep Membre, Commission des prix de la recherche EPFL > VPA > VPA-FAC > CPR vCard Données administratives Biographie Anne-Marie Kermarrec (CV) is Professor at EPFL  since January 2020. Before that she was the CEO of the Mediego startup that she founded in April 2015. Mediego provides content personalization services for online publishers. She was a Research Director at Inria, France from 2004 to 2015. She got a Ph.D. thesis from University of Rennes (France), and has been with Vrije Universiteit, NL and Microsoft Research Cambridge, UK. Anne-Marie received an ERC grant in 2008 and an ERC Proof of Concept in 2013. She received the Montpetit Award in 2011 and the Innovation Award in 2017 from the French Academy of Science. She has been elected to the European Academy in 2013 and named ACM Fellow in 2016. Her research interests are in large-scale distributed systems,  epidemic algorithms,  peer to peer networks and system support for machine learning.Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=aIAy-qcAAAAJDBLP: https://dblp.org/pers/k/Kermarrec:Anne=Marie.html Show more Enseignement & Phd Enseignement Computer Science Communication Systems Doctorants Abuzakuk Sami Omar Charles, Dhasade Akash Balasaheb, Petrescu Diana Andreea, Randl Mathis Benjamin Manuel, Sharma Rishi, Vujasinovic Milos, A dirigé les thèses EPFL de Kucherenko Anastasiia , close Liste complète des adresses et fonctions EPFL IC IINFCOM SACS Professeure ordinaire Statut:  Personnel EPFL IC IINFCOM SACS BC 162 (Bâtiment BC) Station 14 1015 Lausanne +41 21 693 12 97 +41 21 693 75 21 Local: BC 162 EPFL > IC > IINFCOM > SACS EPFL VPA-AVP-DLE AVP-DLE-EDOC EDIC-ENS Professeure ordinaire Statut:  Personnel EPFL > VPA-AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE-EDOC > EDIC-ENS EPFL IC IC-SIN SIN-ENS Professeure ordinaire Statut:  Personnel EPFL > IC > IC-SIN > SIN-ENS EPFL IC IC-SSC SSC-ENS Professeure ordinaire Statut:  Personnel EPFL > IC > IC-SSC > SSC-ENS EPFL VPA-AVP-DLE AVP-DLE AVP-DLE-GE Vice-présidente associée pour l’éducation doctorale et la formation continue Statut:  Personnel EPFL > VPA-AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE-GE EPFL VPA-AVP-DLE AVP-DLE-EDOC CDOCT Présidente de la CDOCT Statut:  Personnel EPFL > VPA-AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE-EDOC > CDOCT EPFL VPA VPA-FAC GEP Membre Statut:  Personnel EPFL > VPA > VPA-FAC > GEP EPFL VPA VPA-FAC CPR Membre Statut:  Personnel EPFL > VPA > VPA-FAC > CPR
